Title: About Informed.cc
what: Informed.cc is a six-month experiment in communication and storytelling .The aim is the explore in detail the following question: To what extent
whatmore:
this is some more about Informed


Not all information is presented equally.


Traditional journalism has changed very little in the past hundred years. Now we read a screen, before paper, but the layout of words arranged into sentences and paragraphs remains fairly constant.  


But in the past ten years especially, huge leaps have been made in digital communication, interaction, user metrics 


Informed.cc explores how digital methods of storytelling can be applied to optimize for information comprehension at scale. 


More importantly, not all information is read and understood equally (or at all). 


The majority of traditional media  has been the same 


But in many cases the comprehension of information at scale is the difference between life and death, 


Informed.cc is 12-month long series of mini-projects that explore every aspect of information visualization and interactivity. 


The goal is to build up a good understanding of how modern approaches to web design can help users understand and engage with difficult thorny topics.
